name: Nidorina
flavorText:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

previous.name: Nidoran♀
previous.flavorText:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

next.name: Nidoqueen
next.flavorText:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.
